amendment.description: An amendment numbered 30 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to increase funding for ICE by $5 million and takes from the Office of the Secretary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
